intent:
Navigate to the Mainichi website and find the page that lists recent economy news. Extract the first 3 news articles and return them in the following EXACT format:

Economy News Page URL: [URL of the economy news listing page]

Article 1:
Title: [article title]
Publication Date: [date]
Summary: [brief summary]

Article 2:
Title: [article title]
Publication Date: [date]
URL: [article URL]
Summary: [brief summary]

Article 3:
Title: [article title]
Publication Date: [date]
URL: [article URL]
Summary: [brief summary]
